title: Your AI Assistant Across Windows & Edge | Microsoft Copilot
text: In a world full of tabs, apps, notifications, and information overload, Microsoft Copilot steps in as your calm, intelligent AI assistant—ready whenever and wherever you need it. Whether you’re working on your PC or browsing the web, Copilot makes it easier to think, create, plan, and solve problems without breaking your flow. Copilot focuses on simplicity, clarity, and everyday usefulness. Rather than another app to manage, it’s a dependable helper on your Windows device and Microsoft Edge browser. By reducing tab overload and helping you stay focused, Copilot keeps your workday smoother and more intuitive. It brings clarity at moments when you’re juggling too much and offers support exactly when you need it. Copilot on Windows 11: Your AI assistant for PC On Windows, Copilot becomes your AI assistant for PC , built into the operating system. You can launch it instantly from the Windows taskbar or the dedicated Copilot key on supported keyboards. Once opened, Copilot works across your apps, files, settings, and even the content on your screen. It helps you: Solve problems faster: Ask for help adjusting settings, troubleshooting issues, or finding the right app or file. Reduce app switching: Instead of bouncing between programs, let Copilot summarize documents, draft content, or pull information together while everything stays in one place. Boost creativity and productivity: Whether you’re writing an email, summarizing a PDF, generating ideas, or planning a project, Copilot stays by your side on Windows to help you move forward with clarity. With Copilot , your PC becomes more intuitive, supporting you as you multitask, organize, and create. Copilot in Edge: Smarter browsing without breaking focus In Microsoft Edge, Copilot lives directly in your browser window, ready to help the moment you need it. This means no new tabs, no copy-pasting, and no losing track of what you were doing. Copilot in Edge offers powerful in‑context support, including: Web page summaries so you can grasp complex information in seconds Rewriting or translating selected text with a single click Instant explanations without leaving your current page Real-time decision support when you’re comparing products, reading reviews, or gathering research By keeping your focus on the page rather than pulling you away from it, Copilot in Edge becomes a seamless part of your browsing experience, helping you stay informed and in control. AI art created via Copilot Why an AI assistant on PC matters Modern life is full of friction and distractions: between too many open tabs and too many apps, it’s easy to feel weighed down by all the micro-decisions we make every day. Switching between tools breaks concentration; searching for answers slows momentum; staying organized becomes its own job. That’s where Copilot shines. As an AI assistant across Windows and Edge, Copilot : Keeps you focused by reducing unnecessary switching Helps you move faster with quick answers, summaries, and explanations Reduces cognitive load when you’re working, browsing, researching, or planning Brings calm clarity to digital chaos Instead of another noisy app, Copilot is a quiet, intelligent presence that supports your thinking from moment to moment. Everyday use cases Here are some ways people use Copilot to stay productive and reduce friction: Research while browsing: Read an article in Edge and ask Copilot follow‑up questions without opening new tabs. Summarize long content: Get clear, concise summaries of articles, PDFs, or documents on your PC. Draft and refine content: Write emails, resumes, proposals, or social posts, and let Copilot revise them for tone, clarity, or structure. Compare shopping options: Ask Copilot to weigh features, specs, or reviews while you shop online . Get unstuck on complex work: Whether you’re analyzing information across apps or juggling multiple tasks, Copilot helps you move forward. With Copilot , navigating your digital day becomes easier and more intuitive. One AI assistant, built into your PC Copilot brings a unified, intelligent assistant to both your PC and browser. Whether you’re working in Windows or browsing in Edge, you get the same consistent support—right where you need it. Fewer tabs. Fewer interruptions. More clarity. With Copilot , you can think better, create faster, and stay focused—across everything you do. Try Copilot today and enjoy better work, faster. DISCLAIMER: Features and functionality subject to change. Articles are written specifically for the United States market; features, functionality, and availability may vary by region.
